title: Identify change in resources with constant returns

content.question: Currently, <math alttext="X Y Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>XYZ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Corporation can produce 50 units of output using 20 workers and 8 units of capital. Which of the following changes in the number of workers, units of capital, and quantity of output are consistent with constant returns to scale?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
